verbose_text: An et al. [XREF_BIBR] have demonstrated that fusidic acid treatment, applied for 2 weeks on the face, was able to decrease the number of SE colonies from 331 to 18, achieving 95% compared to W0, whereas moisturizers increased the number of SE colonies compared to W0.
evidence: fusidic acid treatment, applied for 2 weeks on the face, was able to decrease the number of SE
